resources.string: Make sure to set the currentRoom and endRoom ids.
Make sure that the directions in which the user can move and the items in the room are mentioned in the description
Make sure that objects that can be interacted with are added as interactableObjects and mentioned in the description.
When describing the exits in a room, don't specify where they lead
Only add description to the last room as it ends the game
Generate a %1$s themed game with the following structure.
For an item to be used it has to exist in inventory.
Given the current room's actions: %1$s and the command: '%2$s', indicate if the command corresponds to a valid action and give feedback.
